title: Is AI taking over Wall Street? Here's how AI keeps up with NYSE’s 1.2 trillion daily order messages
description: AI trading stock market: Discover how Artificial Intelligence drives stock market trading on Wall Street as NYSE processes a record 1.2 trillion daily order messages. Learn how AI monitors trades in real time and detects market manipulation.
content:

title: Adtalem, Google Cloud to launch AI credential program for healthcare professionals
description: Adtalem Global Education said on Wednesday it will partner with Alphabet's Google Cloud to launch an artificial intelligence credential program aimed at students and healthcare professionals to use AI tools in clinical practice.
content: The program, set to debut in 2026, will provide students and practicing clinicians across Adtalem's network, including Chamberlain University and Walden University, with hands-on experience using Google Cloud's AI tools, such as Gemini models and Ver... [1532 chars]

title: Foundations want to curb AI developers' influence with $500 million aimed at centering human needs
description: Artificial intelligence is a matter of design — not destiny. title: AI Used to Identify Nazi Executioner in WWII Photo
description: Artificial intelligence was used by a German historian to identify a Nazi executioner in a World War II photograph taken more than 80 years ago.
content:
While artificial intelligence or AI is commonly used to produce trivial or deepfake content, it was used by a German historian to identify a Nazi executioner in a World War II photograph taken more than 80 years ago.
